functions.name: search_web
functions.description: Search the web for real-time information using Serper.dev API. Use this when the user asks about current events, recent information, or specific facts that might not be in your training data.

query.description: The search query to find information about

num_results.description: Number of search results to return (default: 5, max: 10)

functions.name: translate_text
functions.description: Translate text from one language to another using MyMemory API. Supports over 100 language pairs. Use this when user explicitly asks for translation.

source_lang.description: Source language code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish, 'auto' for auto-detection)

target_lang.description: Target language code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'es' for Spanish, 'fr' for French)

functions.name: get_weather
functions.description: Get current weather information for a specific location using OpenWeatherMap API. Use this when user asks about weather conditions, temperature, or forecasts.

functions.name: calculate_math
functions.description: Perform mathematical calculations including basic arithmetic, percentages, and simple algebraic expressions. Use this for mathematical queries that require precise computation.

precision.description: Number of decimal places in the result

functions.name: get_time_info
functions.description: Get current time, date, or timezone information for different locations. Use this when user asks about time, dates, or timezones.
